text: Year 1 was a leap year starting on Thursday in the proleptic Julian calendar. Some sources list it as a common year starting on either Friday or Saturday. At the time, it was known as the Year of the Consulship of Lentulus and Piso. ==Events== * Emperor Augustus made a peace treaty with Phraates V * Ovid writes the Ars Amatoria * Ping of Han becomes Emperor of China * December 25 - Birth of Jesus as given by Dionysius Exiguus == Births == * Ptolemy of Mauretania (d. AD 40) * Jesus Christ (b. 6 April 1BC d. AD 33) == Deaths == *Dong Xian, a Han Dynasty Chinese official under Emperor Ai of Han (b. 23 BC) *Emperor Ai of Han (b. 27 BC) *Empress Fu *Empress Zhao Feiyan (b. 32 BC)
title: 1 BC
